array.string: <b:t>A</b:t> <b:ot tag="b">2 litre bottle of coke</b:ot> <b:t>costs</b:t> <b:ot tag="a">£2,</b:ot> <b:t>and a </b:t> <b:ot tag="d">500ml bottle of of coke</b:ot> <b:t>costs</b:t> <b:ot tag="c">£1.</b:ot> <b:t>Which bottle is better value?</b:t>
<b:ot tag="a" enabled="no">£2</b:ot> <b:op op="÷" picker="yes" /> <b:ot tag="b" enabled="no">2 litres</b:ot> <b:op op="=" /> <b:ot picker="yes" pickerTarget="0.2">0.2</b:ot> <b:t>p per ml</b:t>
<b:ot tag="c" enabled="no">£1</b:ot> <b:op op="÷" picker="yes" /> <b:ot tag="d" enabled="no">500ml</b:ot> <b:op op="=" /> <b:ot picker="yes" pickerTarget="0.5">0.5</b:ot> <b:t>p per ml</b:t>
<b:t>A</b:t> <b:ot tag="d" enabled="no">2 litre bottle of coke</b:ot> <b:t>is better value for money.<b:t>
